overview: It's road trip time! Get in the driver's seat with that horny little honey Helen Duval. She's decided to tour the States in a big ol' convertible. Now that's just fine until she picks up a hitchhiker, Louise. Turns out Louise is on the run from the law. The pair of them team up for a raunchy adventure guaranteed to set your screen on fire. Every trucker, biker and lawman wants to get their hands on this sexy couple.
title: Helen and Louise
